name: Outro
commands: Who...was that at the end there?
That was the necromancer responsible for all the monsters in the city.|He's been using an invisibility spell to hide in the city.|The fool never suspected I could see his aura the whole time.
Is that how he managed to warp monsters right next to you?

Correct.|Thanks to you, no monsters could quite get to me from a safe distance.|He took a risk and came close to warp them right onto me.|Fortunately that also meant my spell did quite some damage to him.|He won't be able to recast that invisibility for some time.|Next time you see him, make sure you finish him off.
Um... about Aesc or I-I mean yourself I suppose.
Yes... I am 'Aesc',  it was a nickname Cyrus gave me in his youth.
You knew teach when he was a kid?
About 50 years ago yes.|He was my pupil long ago.|Given the fact that he told you to find Aesc and he's not with you...|Well...I have an idea what happened.
That woman...she was way out of our league,|even teacher had no chance of beating her...
I see...that matches the description of the woman who entered the castle a week ago.
!|Right you mentioned something about the castle earlier.

1 week ago, a hooded woman named Lilith entered the castle and spoke with Lord Rikard.|Not long after a domed barrier enveloped the castle.|No one quite knows what's happening inside at this point.|Two days after, monsters began showing up inside the city,|and well I've been fighting for the past 3 or so days straight until you three showed up.
You're kidding!|Anyone would have collapsed from exhaustion by this point!|And if what you say is true 50 years ago...
Hah...I'm not quite ready to keel over just yet.|But I suspect that was part of a larger plan.|Keep me out of the equation while that woman sets up her own spell.
Could you still help us fight Lilith and recover the chalice?
I wish I could...|By the time I'm fit to fight again.|Her plan is no doubt complete.|The world will need you three to stop her.
Do we...even stand a chance against her?
We'll need to unleash the full power of those weapons I gave you.|The only way to do that...will be retrieving the last of the set from the castle.
These weapons...are they really the same weapons used in the founding wars?

Yes...|They were sealed away many centuries ago after their use was fufilled.|The exception being the Lithrasir.|Orkney, the founder of Greshia, kept the book with him until death.| When all of the weapons are reunited, I can restore their powers temporarily|
There's a barrier over the castle you said right?|I'm guessing you can break that?
With some difficulty yes.|I... have a hunch of what's happened inside.|Be prepared for the worst.|Rest up for tonight.|We'll enter the castle tommorow.
